comments:
3.1M4.
Got this while installing a new feature (Help > Software Updates > Find and
Install > Search for new features) when I clicked on the feature in the search
results.

Could possibly be related to bug 83101 because I'm getting that error around the
same time.

It could be related. In this particular case, you probably clicked on a 
feature and its description was supposed to be shown below the search results. 
The widget used to display is the FormsText (part of eclipse forms) and it 
probably got confused by the text being passed to it.
If you can identify what feature is causing it, please attach the feature.xml 
here.

Created an attachment (id=17259)
This is the feature that I clicked on that I was trying to install.

It looks like the text passed to the FormText needs to be pre-processed so 
that the xml special chars be escaped first.
fixed by escaping xml special chars

traces.message: The content of elements must consist of well-formed character data or markup.
